name: Flipter
overview:
Flipter conveniently enables users to socially tap into public insight on any topic, Questions are packaged with pre-defined answers, with options to embed images, video and links. Votes are tracked in real-time and broken down according to statistical data, allowing users and the public to identify trends, preferences, public perception and market patterns.
